channel.title: Hacker?
channel.description: Well my RuneScape account which i just got 99 Woodcutting on, just got hacked. I sent in an appeal and they denied it? Idk how i got this hacker in the first place, but i was just wondering if somebody could help me get it back? It had like 25mil on it and full void... Not sure if this is in the right section but W\E

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

Natey:

Did you download and run any random .exes from a server or something…?

Pk Planet is the only server or thing ive downloaded in atleast 3 months…

Davidi2:

sry bout that ill change ur pass back

Um yeah, NOT FUNNY

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

riku9182:

So what should i do?

Appeal it every fucking time it gets denied, i fought for my acc for 12 days…i had keylogger and was retarded and kept changing pass and doing recovs while keylogger was on it, if u have another computer go do it all on that other computer, once u change recovs, pass appeal all that shit then go to your computer that has teh virus and formatt it…

Also to prevent more crap from coming through, get AVG and when you download a server scan it, its how i got keylogged, and like 10 trojans a week but w/e lol good luck…

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Dude, I used to give my lvl 105 Acc to people on private servers for stuff on those servers, and I would let them change my pass, etc… then about 2 months later, I will just send an appeal to JaGex with the following:

“I can’t login, my account says my password has changed. I might of been hacked, can you please check the IP That has logged in most.”

then once they check, i always get unbanned.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

I put all the shit in such as recovery questions and billing but they still denied it…
It doesnt make any fucking sense. I tryed to talk to him on RS when he logged in but all he does is private off
Im afraid i wont get it back this time… What should i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:7, topic:344599”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=440973.msg3239692#msg3239692 date=1276814332]
I never set recovery questions on my RS account, and it was hacked twice, and I got it back both times. This was on the old website though so I don’t know if they still have the same system where you can just give as much details as you can cram into the report along with details such as your email, etc.
[/quote]

Currently you can include the email account you registered with your RuneScape account, along with: Recovery questions, subscription details, 3 previous passwords, email security code, contact details, and other details such as when you created your account/comment box etc.

It even has a Summary Box which tells you how good your recovery appeal is.

If you cannot get your account back with all of these options available, it’s almost obvious that you are not the account owner and did not create the account.[/quote]or… you made it so long ago u dont even remember (me)

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Si Force:

I never set recovery questions on my RS account, and it was hacked twice, and I got it back both times. This was on the old website though so I don’t know if they still have the same system where you can just give as much details as you can cram into the report along with details such as your email, etc.

Currently you can include the email account you registered with your RuneScape account, along with: Recovery questions, subscription details, 3 previous passwords, email security code, contact details, and other details such as when you created your account/comment box etc.

It even has a Summary Box which tells you how good your recovery appeal is.

If you cannot get your account back with all of these options available, it’s almost obvious that you are not the account owner and did not create the account.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Si Force:

This was on the old website though so I don’t know if they still have the same system where you can just give as much details as you can cram into the report along with details such as your email, etc.

You still can, but chances are probably much lower without the recovery questions. So long as you put what payment option you used before, ISP, and whatnot.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

ChaosPkers:

if u didnt set recovery questions, its ur fault

I never set recovery questions on my RS account, and it was hacked twice, and I got it back both times. This was on the old website though so I don’t know if they still have the same system where you can just give as much details as you can cram into the report along with details such as your email, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

What are you sending in an appeal for unless it is banned or muted? Just use recovery questions/any other billing information and they will allow you to unlock your account and change your password.

Most likely you were hacked by someone who you told your password to/a keylogger got you. I’ve temporarily lost an account to a keylogger, so it isn’t that uncommon.

Read full topic
